subject: We Buy Used Computer and Telecom Equipment
body:

We understand nursing and medical facilities are
using valuable square footage to store obsolete equipment, or even facing fees to dispose of it. 
 
KelData would
  like to free up that space and pay you for it.

    

 
We make it easy:
 
Ø       
We
free up your valuable space.
Ø       
We pay
fair market value.
Ø

arrange all shipping.
 
 
  Click here for a quote on your obsolete equipment today!
